result.markdown:
--- title: "Final Project Part 2 Visual" subtitle: "Obesity & Malnourishment" author: "Tori Edmunds" format: html: theme: [cosmo, style/html-sta313.scss] embed-resources: true code-copy: true code-overflow: wrap mainfont: "Palatino" link-external-icon: true link-external-newwindow: true code-annotations: hover execute: echo: true warning: false message: false freeze: auto --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) library(plotly) library(maps) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} obesity_data <- subset(read.csv("data/CleanedData/obesityadults.csv"), select=-1) colnames(obesity_data)[colnames(obesity_data) == "Area"] <- "Country" colnames(obesity_data)[colnames(obesity_data) == "Region"] <- "Continent" colnames(obesity_data)[colnames(obesity_data) == "Percent"] <- "Obesity_Percent" malnour_data <- subset(read.csv("data/CleanedData/undernourishment.csv"), select=-1) colnames(malnour_data)[colnames(malnour_data) == "Area"] <- "Country" colnames(malnour_data)[colnames(malnour_data) == "Region"] <- "Continent" colnames(malnour_data)[colnames(malnour_data) == "AVG_Percent"] <- "Malnourished_Percent" malnour_data$Start_Year <- as.integer(substr(malnour_data$YearPeriod, 2, 5)) malnour_data$End_Year <- as.integer(substr(malnour_data$YearPeriod, 6, 9)) malnour_data <- malnour_data[, -which(names(malnour_data) == "YearPeriod")] ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} df <- merge(obesity_data, malnour_data, by.x = c("Country", "Continent", "Year"), by.y = c("Country", "Continent", "Start_Year")) df <- df[, -which(names(df) %in% c("End_Year"))] ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} averages <- df %>% group_by(Year, Continent) %>% summarise(`Avg Obesity %` = round(mean(Obesity_Percent, na.rm = TRUE), 2), `Avg Malnourished %` = round(mean(as.numeric(Malnourished_Percent), na.rm = TRUE), 2), .groups = "drop") averages <- averages %>% group_by(Continent) %>% mutate(Obesity_Perc_Diff = ifelse(Continent == lag(Continent), round(`Avg Obesity %` - lag(`Avg Obesity %`), 2), ""), Malnourished_Perc_Diff = ifelse(Continent == lag(Continent), round(`Avg Malnourished %` - lag(`Avg Malnourished %`), 2), "")) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} colors <- c("Europe" = "#140D4F", "Africa" = "#598B2C") #malnourished plot subplot_malnourished <- averages %>% plot_ly(x = ~Year, y = ~`Avg Malnourished %`, color = ~Continent, colors=colors, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines+markers', showlegend=TRUE, text=~Malnourished_Perc_Diff, hovertemplate = paste("%{y:.2f}% (%{text}% change)", ""), marker = list(size = 8)) %>% layout(title = "Average Malnourishment Rate (2000-2020)", xaxis = list(title = "Year", tickvals = seq(2000, 2020, by = 2)), yaxis = list(title = "Avg. Malnourishment %", tickvals = seq(0, max(averages$`Avg Malnourished %`) + 1, by = 2), ticktext = paste0(seq(0, max(averages$`Avg Malnourished %`) + 1, by = 2), "%")), hovermode = "x unified", paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font=list(family="Palatino"), legend=list(x=1, y=0.5, borderwidth=1, bordercolor='black')) #obesity plot subplot_obesity <- averages %>% plot_ly(x = ~Year, y = ~`Avg Obesity %`, color = ~Continent, colors=colors, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines+markers', showlegend=TRUE, text=~Obesity_Perc_Diff, hovertemplate = paste("%{y:.2f}% (%{text}% increase)", ""), marker = list(size = 8)) %>% layout(title = "Average Obesity Rate (2000-2020)", xaxis = list(title = "Year", tickvals = seq(2000, 2016, by = 2)), yaxis = list(title = "Avg. Obesity %", tickvals = seq(0, max(averages$`Avg Malnourished %`) + 1, by = 2), ticktext = paste0(seq(0, max(averages$`Avg Malnourished %`) + 1, by = 2), "%")), hovermode = "x unified", paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font=list(family="Palatino"), legend=list(x=1, y=0.5, borderwidth=1, bordercolor='black')) subplot_malnourished ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} subplot_obesity ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # subset africa_data <- averages %>% filter(Continent == "Africa") europe_data <- averages %>% filter(Continent == "Europe") # malnourishment plots malnourished_africa <- plot_ly(africa_data, x = ~Year, y = ~`Avg Malnourished %`, type = 'bar', color = ~Continent, colors = colors, showlegend = FALSE, text=~Malnourished_Perc_Diff, hovertemplate = paste("%{y:.2f}% (%{text}% change)")) %>% layout(title = "Average Malnourishment Rate in Africa and Europe (2000-2020)", xaxis = list(title = "Year", tickvals = seq(2000, 2020, by = 2)), yaxis = list(title = "Avg Malnourishment %", range = c(0,25), tickvals = seq(0, 25, by = 5), ticktext = paste0(seq(0, 25, by = 5), "%")), hovermode = "x unified", paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino"), legend=list(x=1.05, y=0.5, borderwidth=1, bordercolor='black')) malnourished_europe <- plot_ly(europe_data, x = ~Year, y = ~`Avg Malnourished %`, type = 'bar', color = ~Continent, colors = colors, showlegend = FALSE, text=~Malnourished_Perc_Diff, hovertemplate = paste("%{y:.2f}% (%{text}% change)")) %>% layout(xaxis = list(title = "Year", tickvals = seq(2000, 2020, by = 2)), yaxis = list(title = "Avg Malnourishment %", range = c(0,25), tickvals = seq(0, 25, by = 5), ticktext = paste0(seq(0, 25, by = 5), "%")), hovermode = "x unified", paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino")) # create subplot for malnourishment subplot_barcharts <- subplot( malnourished_africa, malnourished_europe, nrows = 2, margin = 0.05 ) subplot_barcharts ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # obesity plots obesity_africa <- plot_ly(africa_data, x = ~Year, y = ~`Avg Obesity %`, type = 'bar', color = ~Continent, colors = colors, showlegend = FALSE, text=~Obesity_Perc_Diff, hovertemplate = paste("%{y:.2f}% (%{text}% increase)")) %>% layout(title = "Average Obesity Rate in Africa and Europe (2000-2020)", xaxis = list(title = "Year", tickvals = seq(2000, 2016, by = 2)), yaxis = list(title = "Avg Obesity %", range = c(0,25), tickvals = seq(0, 25, by = 5), ticktext = paste0(seq(0, 25, by = 5), "%")), hovermode = "x unified", paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino"), legend=list(x=1.05, y=0.5, borderwidth=1, bordercolor='black')) obesity_europe <- plot_ly(europe_data, x = ~Year, y = ~`Avg Obesity %`, type = 'bar', color = ~Continent, colors = colors, showlegend = FALSE, text=~Obesity_Perc_Diff, hovertemplate = paste("%{y:.2f}% (%{text}% increase)")) %>% layout(xaxis = list(title = "Year", tickvals = seq(2000, 2016, by = 2)), yaxis = list(title = "Avg Obesity %", range = c(0,25), tickvals = seq(0, 25, by = 5), ticktext = paste0(seq(0, 25, by = 5), "%")), hovermode = "x unified", paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino")) # create subplot for obesity subplot_barcharts1 <- subplot( obesity_africa, obesity_europe, nrows = 2, margin = 0.05 ) subplot_barcharts1 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} world_map <- map_data("world") choropleth <- merge(world_map, df, by.x="region", by.y="Country", all.x=TRUE) choropleth <- choropleth[!is.na(choropleth$Year), ] choropleth <- subset(choropleth, select=-subregion) choropleth <- choropleth %>% arrange(region, Year) %>% mutate(Malnourished_Percent = ifelse(Malnourished_Percent == "<2.5", 2.5, Malnourished_Percent)) %>% filter(Malnourished_Percent != "") %>% mutate(Malnourished_Percent = as.numeric(`Malnourished_Percent`)) choropleth <- choropleth %>% group_by(region, Year) %>% summarise(Longitude = mean(long), Latitude = mean(lat), Continent = first(Continent), `Obesity %` = first(Obesity_Percent), `Malnourished %` = first(Malnourished_Percent), Group = first(group), .groups="drop") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} country_avgs <- choropleth %>% group_by(region) %>% summarise( Longitude = mean(Longitude), Latitude = mean(Latitude), Continent = first(Continent), Avg_Obesity_Perc = round(mean(`Obesity %`, na.rm = TRUE), 2), Avg_Malnour_Perc = round(mean(`Malnourished %`, na.rm = TRUE), 2), .groups = "drop" ) head(country_avgs) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 6 × 6 region Longitude Latitude Continent Avg_Obesity_Perc Avg_Malnour_Perc 1 Albania 20.1 41.1 Europe 17.2 5.67 2 Algeria 1.78 29.2 Africa 22.2 4.46 3 Angola 17.4 -10.8 Africa 5.71 31.6 4 Austria 13.5 47.6 Europe 16.9 2.5 5 Belarus 28.1 53.5 Europe 21.6 2.58 6 Belgium 4.73 50.6 Europe 19.5 2.5 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} custom_palette <- c("steelblue1", "royalblue3", "firebrick2", "firebrick4") europe_subset <- subset(country_avgs, Continent == "Europe") # obesity europe_ob <- plot_ly( data = europe_subset, z = ~Avg_Obesity_Perc, locations = ~region, locationmode = "country names", type = "choropleth", color = ~Avg_Obesity_Perc, colors = custom_palette, marker = list(line = list(color = "black", width = 1)), text=~region, hovertemplate = paste("%{text}: %{z:.2f}%", "") ) %>% colorbar(title = "Rate") %>% layout( title = "Average Obesity Rate in Europe (2000-2020)", geo = list(scope = "europe", projection = list(type = "natural earth"), showlakes = FALSE, showframe=TRUE, showland = TRUE, showcountries = TRUE, showcoastlines = TRUE, countrycolor = "black", countrywidth = 1, lonaxis = list(range = c(-20, 39)), lataxis = list(range = c(32, 80)), resolution = 50, landcolor="aliceblue"), paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino"), legend=list(x=1.05, y=0.5, borderwidth=1, bordercolor='black', title="Obesity Rate") ) # malnourishment europe_mal <- plot_ly( data = europe_subset, z = ~Avg_Malnour_Perc, locations = ~region, locationmode = "country names", type = "choropleth", color = ~Avg_Malnour_Perc, colors = custom_palette, marker = list(line = list(color = "black", width = 1)), text=~region, hovertemplate = paste("%{text}: %{z:.2f}%", "") ) %>% colorbar(title = "Rate")%>% layout( title = "Average Malnourishment Rate in Europe (2000-2020)", geo = list(scope = "world", projection = list(type = "natural earth"), showlakes = FALSE, showland = TRUE, showcountries = TRUE, showcoastlines = TRUE, showframe = TRUE, countrycolor = "black", countrywidth = 1, lonaxis = list(range = c(-20, 39)), lataxis = list(range = c(32, 80)), resolution = 50, landcolor="aliceblue"), paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino") ) europe_ob ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} europe_mal ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} africa_subset <- subset(country_avgs, Continent == "Africa") # obesity africa_ob <- plot_ly( data = africa_subset, z = ~Avg_Obesity_Perc, locations = ~region, locationmode = "country names", type = "choropleth", color = ~Avg_Obesity_Perc, colors = custom_palette, marker = list(line = list(color = "black", width = 1)), text=~region, hovertemplate = paste("%{text}: %{z:.2f}%", "") ) %>% colorbar(title = "Rate") %>% layout( title = "Average Obesity Rate in Africa (2000-2020)", geo = list(scope = "world", projection = list(type = "equirectangular"), showlakes = FALSE, showland = TRUE, showcountries = TRUE, showcoastlines = TRUE, showframe = TRUE, countrycolor = "black", countrywidth = 1, lonaxis = list(range = c(-20, 55)), lataxis = list(range = c(-38, 40)), resolution = 50, landcolor="aliceblue"), paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino"), legend=list(x=1.05, y=0.5, borderwidth=1, bordercolor='black', title="Obesity Rate") ) # malnourishment africa_mal <- plot_ly( data = africa_subset, z = ~Avg_Malnour_Perc, locations = ~region, locationmode = "country names", type = "choropleth", color = ~Avg_Malnour_Perc, colors = custom_palette, marker = list(line = list(color = "black", width = 1)), text=~region, hovertemplate = paste("%{text}: %{z:.2f}%", "") ) %>% colorbar(title = "Rate")%>% layout( title = "Average Malnourishment Rate in Africa (2000-2020)", geo = list(scope = "world", projection = list(type = "equirectangular"), showlakes = FALSE, showland = TRUE, showcountries = TRUE, showcoastlines = TRUE, showframe = TRUE, countrycolor = "black", countrywidth = 1, lonaxis = list(range = c(-20, 55)), lataxis = list(range = c(-38, 40)), resolution = 50, landcolor="aliceblue"), paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino") ) africa_ob ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} africa_mal ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} obesity_map <- plot_ly( data = country_avgs, z = ~Avg_Obesity_Perc, locations = ~region, locationmode = "country names", type = "choropleth", color = ~Avg_Obesity_Perc, colors = custom_palette, marker = list(line = list(color = "black", width = 1)), text=~region, hovertemplate = paste("%{text}'s Obesity Rate = %{z:.2f}%", "") ) %>% colorbar(title = "Rate") %>% layout( title = "Average Obesity Rate (2000-2020)", geo = list(scope = "world", projection = list(type = "equirectangular"), showlakes = FALSE, showland = TRUE, showcountries = TRUE, showcoastlines = TRUE, showframe = TRUE, countrycolor = "black", countrywidth = 0.5, lonaxis = list(range = c(-30, 60)), lataxis = list(range = c(-40, 82)), resolution = 50, landcolor="aliceblue"), paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino"), legend=list(x=1.05, y=0.5, borderwidth=1, bordercolor='black', title="Obesity Rate") ) malnourished_map <- plot_ly( data = country_avgs, z = ~Avg_Malnour_Perc, locations = ~region, locationmode = "country names", type = "choropleth", color = ~Avg_Malnour_Perc, colors = custom_palette, marker = list(line = list(color = "black", width = 1)), text=~region, hovertemplate = paste("%{text}'s Malnourishment Rate = %{z:.2f}%", "") ) %>% colorbar(title = "Rate")%>% layout( title = "Average Malnourishment Rate (2000-2020)", geo = list(scope = "world", projection = list(type = "equirectangular"), showlakes = FALSE, showland = TRUE, showcountries = TRUE, showcoastlines = TRUE, showframe = TRUE, countrycolor = "black", countrywidth = 0.5, lonaxis = list(range = c(-30, 60)), lataxis = list(range = c(-40, 82)), resolution = 50, landcolor="aliceblue"), paper_bgcolor = "aliceblue", font = list(family = "Palatino") ) obesity_map ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} malnourished_map ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
